mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title},#{content}, #{fileName}, #{saveName}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT B.BNO, B.WRITER, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.FILENAME, B.SAVENAME, B.CREATED, B.LASTMODIFIED FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.BNO, A.WRITER, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.FILENAME, A.SAVENAME, A.CREATED, A.LASTMODIFIED FROM (SELECT BNO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, SAVENAME, CREATED, LASTMODIFIED FROM BOARD ORDER BY BNO DESC)A )B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
